name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare And Pull Request Prompt Box Killer For Github

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically hides the "Compare & pull request" prompt box on GitHub repository pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Compare And Pull Request Prompt Box Killer For Github

A simple Chrome extension that hides the "Compare & pull request" prompt box on GitHub repository pages.

2. Features

2.1 Automatically hides the "Compare & pull request" prompt box on GitHub repository pages
2.2 Lightweight with no impact on page performance
2.3 No configuration needed, works right after installation

3. Usage

Once installed, the extension will automatically take effect on GitHub pages without any additional settings.
